description.value: This project provides electrophysiological data to study the role played by neuroligin (NLGN)-neurexin (NRXN) connections and gephyrin in regulating signaling between post- and presynaptic processing.

dataset.value: Modulation of cortical GABAergic currents by anti-gephyrin intrabodies (scFv-geph NLSC)
Modulation of cortical GABAergic currents by anti-gephyrin intrabodies (scFv-gephcyto)
Modulation of cortical GABAergic currents by anti-neuroligin 2 (scFvNLG2-645)
Modulation of hippocampal GABAergic currents by anti-gephyrin intrabodies (delta2-188)
Modulation of hippocampal GABAergic currents by anti-gephyrin intrabodies (scFv-geph NLS)

title.value: Electrophysiological data under neuroligin or gephyrin block
